name: Remains of the Day
description:
If the world can cast off the sun and still endure, who is to say that you can't do the same with your own life?

Remains of the Day invites you to venture below Edinburgh and begin to uncover the secrets of your new home, in the hope that you might begin to uncover your own.

A Gothic horror adventure which owes a great debt to 19th century literature and the vast canon of vampirism, Remains of the Day aims to unsettle, intrigue and hopefully delight. Contains mature themes and imagery, and is of a considerably morbid bent.
